meanings.definition: A paid advertisement on television or radio.
meanings.sent1: During the show, they interrupted it with commercials.
meanings.sent2: I saw a funny commercial on TV last night.
meanings.sent3: The commercials were so loud, they woke up the neighbors!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a commercial for happiness.
meanings.sent5: The jingle in the commercial stuck in my head all day.

meanings.definition: An advertisement in a newspaper or magazine.
meanings.sent1: I always check the classifieds for commercials about sales.
meanings.sent2: The magazine had colorful commercials for new products.
meanings.sent3: The commercial in the newspaper made me crave pizza.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a commercial in a glossy magazine.
meanings.sent5: The commercial in the magazine was so enticing, I had to buy the product.

meanings.definition: A short promotional video on the internet.
meanings.sent1: I watched a commercial for the new phone on YouTube.
meanings.sent2: The internet is full of commercials for various products.
meanings.sent3: The commercial on the website was so catchy, I watched it twice.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves in the commercial went viral on the internet.
meanings.sent5: The commercial online was so creative, it became a meme.
